metadata.description: Master Vascular Surgery CPT Database with 2025/2026 versioning and op-note generation support
metadata.data_source: CMS Physician Fee Schedule CY2025 Final Rule (Addendum B)
metadata.notes: wRVU values from CMS Physician Fee Schedule. 2026 values are preliminary pending final rule.

codes.full_name: Selective catheter placement, arterial system; 1st order
codes.details: First order branch off the aorta (e.g., renal, mesenteric origins).
codes.documentation_tips: Document catheter tip position and vessel accessed.
codes.bundling_notes: Included in many bundled intervention codes.

codes.full_name: Selective catheter placement, arterial system; 2nd order
codes.details: Second order selective catheterization (branch of 1st order vessel).
codes.documentation_tips: Document full catheter course and tip position.
codes.bundling_notes: Included in many bundled intervention codes.

codes.full_name: Selective catheter placement, arterial system; 3rd order or more
codes.details: Third order or beyond. Bill for the DRIVE, not just the angio. Common for tib/pedal work.
codes.documentation_tips: Document full catheter course through each order to final position.
codes.bundling_notes: Often bundled into LER codes. May bill separately for diagnostic-only cases.

codes.full_name: Selective catheter placement, additional 2nd/3rd order arterial branch
codes.details: Add-on for additional branches within same vascular family.
codes.documentation_tips: Document each additional branch catheterized.

codes.full_name: Intravascular ultrasound (IVUS), initial noncoronary vessel
codes.details: Always use for endovascular interventions. Document vessel examined and findings.
codes.documentation_tips: Specify vessel(s) examined, record pathology findings, save representative images.
codes.bundling_notes: Bills with primary intervention code. One per vessel family.

codes.full_name: Intravascular ultrasound (IVUS), each additional noncoronary vessel
codes.details: Add-on code for each additional vessel examined with IVUS.
codes.documentation_tips: Document each separate vessel examined.
codes.bundling_notes: Use with 37252. Report once per additional vessel.

codes.full_name: Ultrasound guidance for vascular access
codes.details: Document ultrasound use, patency confirmation, permanent recording.
codes.documentation_tips: Must document: real-time visualization, evaluation of potential access sites, patency, permanent recording of images.
codes.bundling_notes: Bills separately from access procedure. Requires documented image.

codes.full_name: Amputation, thigh, through femur, any level
codes.details: Standard above-knee amputation at any femoral level.
codes.documentation_tips: Document level of amputation, indication, tissue viability assessment.
codes.bundling_notes: 90-day global. Revision within global requires modifier 78.

codes.full_name: Amputation, leg, through tibia and fibula
codes.details: Standard below-knee amputation.
codes.documentation_tips: Document level, flap design, indication.
codes.bundling_notes: 90-day global. Higher wRVU than AKA reflects technical complexity.

codes.full_name: Amputation, foot; transmetatarsal
codes.details: Transmetatarsal amputation. Bill debridements (1104x) separately ONLY if on different anatomic site.
codes.documentation_tips: Document metatarsal level, tissue margins, any concurrent debridement sites.
codes.bundling_notes: Cannot bill toe amps or debridement of same foot same day.

codes.full_name: Amputation, toe; metatarsophalangeal joint
codes.details: Toe amputation at MTP joint level. Ray amputation includes metatarsal head.
codes.documentation_tips: Specify which toe(s), level of amputation.
codes.bundling_notes: Use toe modifiers (T5-TA) to specify digit.

codes.full_name: Endovascular repair of descending thoracic aorta; covering left subclavian artery origin
codes.details: TEVAR covering LSA origin. 2026: Revised descriptor, imaging now bundled, wRVU reduced.
codes.documentation_tips: Document LSA coverage, need for revascularization, landing zones.
codes.bundling_notes: 2026: Now includes all imaging S&I (75956 deleted).

codes.full_name: Endovascular repair of descending thoracic aorta; not covering left subclavian artery origin
codes.details: TEVAR not covering LSA. 2026: Revised descriptor, imaging bundled.
codes.documentation_tips: Document landing zones, LSA preservation.
codes.bundling_notes: 2026: Now includes all imaging S&I (75957 deleted).

codes.full_name: Endovascular repair of descending thoracic aorta; with fenestration for left subclavian artery stent graft
codes.details: NEW 2026 CODE. TEVAR with fenestrated graft for LSA branch stent.
codes.documentation_tips: Document fenestration placement, LSA stent deployment, seal verification.
codes.bundling_notes: Includes all imaging. Cannot bill with 33880 or 33881.

codes.full_name: Placement of proximal extension prosthesis for endovascular repair of descending thoracic aorta
codes.details: Proximal extension component. 2026: Revised descriptor, imaging bundled.
codes.documentation_tips: Document extension landing zone, overlap with main body.

codes.full_name: Placement of distal extension prosthesis(es) delayed after endovascular repair of descending thoracic aorta
codes.details: Delayed distal extension. Report once regardless of number of extensions. 2026: Revised.
codes.documentation_tips: Document indication for extension, landing zones.
codes.bundling_notes: Do not use for same-session distal extensions (bundled in primary).

codes.full_name: Endovascular repair of infrarenal aorta; aorto-aortic tube prosthesis
codes.details: Tube graft EVAR without iliac extension.
codes.documentation_tips: Document aneurysm morphology, landing zones, seal.

codes.full_name: Endovascular repair of infrarenal aorta; aorto-aortic tube prosthesis, for rupture
codes.details: Emergent tube graft for ruptured AAA.
codes.documentation_tips: Document rupture, hemodynamic status, urgency.
codes.bundling_notes: Higher wRVU reflects emergent nature and complexity.

codes.full_name: Endovascular repair of infrarenal aorta; aorto-uni-iliac prosthesis
codes.details: AUI device with fem-fem bypass. Elective.
codes.documentation_tips: Document device configuration, fem-fem bypass if performed.

codes.full_name: Endovascular repair of infrarenal aorta; aorto-uni-iliac prosthesis, for rupture
codes.details: Emergent AUI for ruptured AAA.
codes.documentation_tips: Document rupture, resuscitation status.

codes.full_name: Endovascular repair of infrarenal aorta; aorto-bi-iliac prosthesis
codes.details: Standard bifurcated EVAR - most common configuration.
codes.documentation_tips: Document main body and limb deployment, seal zones.
codes.bundling_notes: Includes bilateral iliac limbs. Most frequently used EVAR code.

codes.full_name: Endovascular repair of infrarenal aorta; aorto-bi-iliac prosthesis, for rupture
codes.details: Emergent bifurcated EVAR for rupture.
codes.documentation_tips: Document rupture, hemodynamic status.

codes.full_name: Delayed placement of distal or proximal extension prosthesis for endovascular infrarenal aortic repair
codes.details: For relining or extension at separate session.
codes.documentation_tips: Document indication (endoleak, migration, etc.).
codes.bundling_notes: Cannot use same session as primary EVAR.

codes.full_name: Endovascular repair of visceral aorta; 1 visceral artery endoprosthesis
codes.details: Fenestrated/branched EVAR with 1 visceral vessel incorporation.
codes.documentation_tips: Document which vessel, stent placement, patency confirmation.

codes.full_name: Endovascular repair of visceral aorta; 2 visceral artery endoprostheses
codes.details: FEVAR with 2 visceral vessel incorporations.
codes.documentation_tips: Document both vessels, stent placements.

codes.full_name: Endovascular repair of visceral aorta; 3 visceral artery endoprostheses
codes.details: FEVAR with 3 visceral vessel incorporations.
codes.documentation_tips: Document all three vessels.

codes.full_name: Endovascular repair of visceral aorta; 4 or more visceral artery endoprostheses
codes.details: FEVAR with 4+ visceral vessels (typically includes renals + mesenteric).
codes.documentation_tips: Document all vessels incorporated.

codes.full_name: Arteriovenous anastomosis, forearm vein transposition
codes.details: Transposition fistula (e.g., radial artery to transposed basilic/cephalic vein).
codes.documentation_tips: Document vein transposed, arterial inflow source.
codes.bundling_notes: Higher wRVU than direct fistula reflects transposition work.

codes.full_name: Arteriovenous anastomosis, upper arm basilic vein transposition
codes.details: Brachial artery to transposed basilic vein (brachiobasilic transposition).
codes.documentation_tips: Document basilic vein mobilization and superficialization.
codes.bundling_notes: Most common upper arm transposition fistula.

codes.full_name: Arteriovenous anastomosis, forearm cephalic vein transposition
codes.details: Forearm cephalic vein transposition fistula.
codes.documentation_tips: Document cephalic vein mobilization.
codes.bundling_notes: Less common than radiocephalic direct fistula.

codes.full_name: Arteriovenous anastomosis, direct, any site
codes.details: Direct AVF (e.g., radiocephalic, brachiocephalic) without transposition.
codes.documentation_tips: Document artery, vein, anastomosis type.

codes.full_name: Creation of arteriovenous fistula by other than direct arteriovenous anastomosis; nonautogenous graft
codes.details: AV graft placement (typically PTFE loop or straight).
codes.documentation_tips: Document graft type, configuration (loop vs straight), tunneling.

codes.full_name: Thrombectomy, open, arteriovenous fistula without revision
codes.details: Surgical thrombectomy without revision of access.
codes.documentation_tips: Document thrombectomy technique, completion assessment.

codes.full_name: Revision, open, arteriovenous fistula; without thrombectomy, autogenous or nonautogenous dialysis graft
codes.details: Surgical revision without thrombectomy (e.g., patch, interposition).
codes.documentation_tips: Document type of revision, segment revised.

codes.full_name: Revision, open, arteriovenous fistula; with thrombectomy, autogenous or nonautogenous dialysis graft
codes.details: Combined surgical revision with thrombectomy.
codes.documentation_tips: Document both revision type and thrombectomy.

codes.full_name: Introduction of needle(s) and/or catheter(s), dialysis circuit, diagnostic angiography
codes.details: Diagnostic fistulogram only - no intervention. Use modifier 52 if via existing access.
codes.documentation_tips: Document complete circuit imaging from arterial anastomosis to central veins.
codes.bundling_notes: DO NOT bill with 36902-36906. Can bill with add-ons 36907-36909.

codes.full_name: Dialysis circuit angioplasty, peripheral segment, with diagnostic angiography
codes.details: Workhorse code. Includes fistulogram AND peripheral angioplasty (any number of lesions).
codes.documentation_tips: Document all lesions treated in peripheral segment.
codes.bundling_notes: Cannot bill 36901. Report once regardless of number of angioplasties.

codes.full_name: Dialysis circuit stent placement, peripheral segment, with diagnostic angiography
codes.details: Includes fistulogram, angioplasty AND stent in peripheral segment.
codes.documentation_tips: Document stent size, location, post-deployment result.

codes.full_name: Percutaneous thrombectomy and/or thrombolysis, dialysis circuit
codes.details: Declotting without angioplasty. Includes any method (mechanical, pharmacological, lyse-and-wait).
codes.documentation_tips: Document thrombectomy method, completion assessment.
codes.bundling_notes: Cannot bill 36901-36903. Use 36905 if angio added.

codes.full_name: Percutaneous thrombectomy with angioplasty, peripheral segment, dialysis circuit
codes.details: Declotting PLUS peripheral angioplasty. Includes fistulogram.
codes.documentation_tips: Document thrombectomy and all angioplasty sites.
codes.bundling_notes: Cannot bill 36901-36904. Use 36906 if stent added.

codes.full_name: Percutaneous thrombectomy with stent placement, peripheral segment, dialysis circuit
codes.details: Declotting with peripheral stent (includes angioplasty). Highest complexity base code.
codes.documentation_tips: Document thrombectomy, angioplasty, and stent details.
codes.bundling_notes: Cannot bill 36901-36905. Includes all peripheral interventions.

codes.full_name: Dialysis circuit angioplasty, central segment, through dialysis circuit
codes.details: Add-on for central vein angioplasty (subclavian, brachiocephalic, SVC).
codes.documentation_tips: Document central lesion location and treatment.
codes.bundling_notes: Add-on to 36901-36906. Report once per session.

codes.full_name: Dialysis circuit stent placement, central segment, through dialysis circuit
codes.details: Add-on for central vein stent (includes angioplasty).
codes.documentation_tips: Document stent size, location, deployment result.

codes.full_name: Dialysis circuit embolization or occlusion, including all imaging guidance
codes.details: Add-on for embolization of accessory veins or circuit.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vessels embolized, embolic agent used.
codes.bundling_notes: Add-on to 36901-36906. Report once regardless of number of veins.

codes.full_name: Office/outpatient visit, new patient, low complexity
codes.details: 30-44 minutes total time or low MDM complexity.
codes.documentation_tips: Document time OR medical decision-making elements.
codes.bundling_notes: Use modifier 25 if billing with minor procedure same day.

codes.full_name: Office/outpatient visit, new patient, moderate complexity
codes.details: 45-59 minutes total time or moderate MDM complexity.
codes.documentation_tips: Document time OR medical decision-making elements.
codes.bundling_notes: Most common new patient level for vascular consults.

codes.full_name: Office/outpatient visit, new patient, high complexity
codes.details: 60-74 minutes total time or high MDM complexity.
codes.documentation_tips: Document time OR medical decision-making elements.
codes.bundling_notes: Reserve for complex cases with significant data review.

codes.full_name: Office/outpatient visit, established patient, low complexity
codes.details: 20-29 minutes total time or low MDM complexity.
codes.documentation_tips: Document time OR medical decision-making elements.

codes.full_name: Office/outpatient visit, established patient, moderate complexity
codes.details: 30-39 minutes total time or moderate MDM complexity.
codes.documentation_tips: Document time OR medical decision-making elements.
codes.bundling_notes: Most common established patient level for vascular.

codes.full_name: Office/outpatient visit, established patient, high complexity
codes.details: 40-54 minutes total time or high MDM complexity.
codes.documentation_tips: Document time OR medical decision-making elements.

codes.full_name: Initial hospital care, low complexity
codes.details: 40 minutes total time or low/moderate MDM.
codes.documentation_tips: Document admission note with H&P elements.
codes.bundling_notes: Principal physician of record bills initial hospital care.

codes.full_name: Initial hospital care, moderate complexity
codes.details: 55 minutes total time or moderate MDM.
codes.documentation_tips: Document admission note with H&P elements.

codes.full_name: Initial hospital care, high complexity
codes.details: 75 minutes total time or high MDM.
codes.documentation_tips: Document comprehensive admission with complex decision-making.

codes.full_name: Subsequent hospital care, low complexity
codes.details: 25 minutes total time or straightforward/low MDM.
codes.documentation_tips: Document progress note with interval assessment.

codes.full_name: Subsequent hospital care, moderate complexity
codes.details: 35 minutes total time or moderate MDM.
codes.documentation_tips: Document progress note with detailed assessment.

codes.full_name: Subsequent hospital care, high complexity
codes.details: 50 minutes total time or high MDM.
codes.documentation_tips: Document comprehensive progress note.
codes.bundling_notes: Use for unstable patients or complex decisions.

codes.full_name: Hospital discharge day management, 30 minutes or less
codes.details: Discharge day management 30 minutes or less.
codes.documentation_tips: Document discharge summary, instructions, prescriptions.

codes.full_name: Hospital discharge day management, more than 30 minutes
codes.details: Discharge day management over 30 minutes.
codes.documentation_tips: Document time spent and complexity of discharge planning.
codes.bundling_notes: Use for complex discharges requiring extended coordination.

codes.full_name: Transcatheter placement of cervical carotid artery stent, with distal embolic protection
codes.details: Carotid artery stenting with embolic protection device.
codes.documentation_tips: Document stenosis %, EPD type, deployment/retrieval, final result.

codes.full_name: Transcatheter placement of cervical carotid artery stent, without distal embolic protection
codes.details: Carotid stenting without EPD (rare, specific indications).
codes.documentation_tips: Document reason EPD not used.
codes.bundling_notes: Slightly higher wRVU reflects different complexity profile.

codes.full_name: Transcatheter placement of intravascular stent, retrograde approach, carotid/innominate with open carotid exposure
codes.details: Transcarotid artery revascularization (TCAR). Includes flow reversal.
codes.documentation_tips: Document surgical exposure, flow reversal setup, stent deployment.
codes.bundling_notes: Highest carotid stent wRVU. Includes open exposure.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, iliac artery, angioplasty; initial vessel
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37254 (stenosis) or 37256 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: 2025: Document lesion characteristics for 2026 crosswalk.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, iliac artery, stent; initial vessel
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37258 (stenosis) or 37260 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: 2025: Document lesion characteristics for 2026 crosswalk.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, iliac artery, angioplasty; each additional vessel
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37255 (stenosis) or 37257 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: Add-on to 37220 or 37221.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, iliac artery, stent; each additional vessel
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37259 (stenosis) or 37261 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: Add-on to 37220 or 37221.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal artery; angioplasty
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37263 (stenosis) or 37265 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: Entire fem/pop territory = single vessel. Document lesion type for 2026.
codes.bundling_notes: Entire fem/pop territory is ONE vessel for coding purposes.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal artery; atherectomy
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37271 (stenosis) or 37273 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: Includes angioplasty. Document atherectomy device and lesion type.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal artery; stent
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37267 (stenosis) or 37269 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: Includes angioplasty. Document stent type/size.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal artery; stent + atherectomy
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37275 (stenosis) or 37277 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: Most intensive fem/pop code. Document both interventions.
codes.bundling_notes: Highest fem/pop wRVU. Report even if interventions at different lesions.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal artery; angioplasty, initial vessel
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37280 (stenosis) or 37282 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: Each tibial vessel is separate for coding. Document vessel and lesion type.
codes.bundling_notes: Unlike fem/pop, each tibial vessel coded separately.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal artery; atherectomy, initial vessel
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37288 (stenosis) or 37290 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: Includes angioplasty. Document atherectomy device.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal artery; stent, initial vessel
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37284 (stenosis) or 37286 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: Includes angioplasty. Document stent details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal artery; stent + atherectomy, initial vessel
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37292 (stenosis) or 37294 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: Most intensive tibial code. Document all interventions.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal artery; angioplasty, each additional vessel
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37281 (stenosis) or 37283 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: Add-on for each additional tibial vessel.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal artery; atherectomy, each additional vessel
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37289 (stenosis) or 37291 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: Add-on for additional tibial atherectomy.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal artery; stent, each additional vessel
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37285 (stenosis) or 37287 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: Add-on for additional tibial stent.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal artery; stent + atherectomy, each additional vessel
codes.details: DELETED 2026. Use 37293 (stenosis) or 37295 (occlusion) instead.
codes.documentation_tips: Add-on for additional tibial stent + atherectomy.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, iliac territory; angioplasty, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Straightforward = stenosis (not 100% occluded). Iliac territory.
codes.documentation_tips: Document lesion as stenosis (not total occlusion) for correct code selection.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, iliac territory; angioplasty, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for additional iliac vessel with stenosis.
codes.documentation_tips: Document each additional vessel treated.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, iliac territory; angioplasty, complex occlusion, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Complex = 100% occlusion (CTO). Higher wRVU reflects crossing difficulty.
codes.documentation_tips: Document total occlusion for correct code selection.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, iliac territory; angioplasty, complex occlusion, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for additional iliac CTO.
codes.documentation_tips: Document each additional occluded vessel treated.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, iliac territory; stent, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Stent placement for stenotic lesion. Includes angioplasty.
codes.documentation_tips: Document stenosis and stent details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, iliac territory; stent, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for additional stenotic iliac stent.
codes.documentation_tips: Document each additional stented vessel.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, iliac territory; stent, complex occlusion, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Stent for CTO. Highest iliac wRVU.
codes.documentation_tips: Document total occlusion, crossing technique, stent details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, iliac territory; stent, complex occlusion, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for additional CTO iliac stent.
codes.documentation_tips: Document each additional occluded vessel stented.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; angioplasty, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Angioplasty for stenotic fem/pop lesion.
codes.documentation_tips: Document stenosis (not CTO). Entire fem/pop = single vessel.
codes.bundling_notes: Entire fem/pop territory is ONE vessel for coding.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; angioplasty, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for contralateral fem/pop or different vascular territory.
codes.documentation_tips: Use for bilateral cases or additional territories.
codes.bundling_notes: Use with primary fem/pop or other territory code.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; angioplasty, complex occlusion, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Angioplasty for CTO. Higher wRVU for crossing work.
codes.documentation_tips: Document total occlusion, crossing technique.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; angioplasty, complex occlusion, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for additional CTO angioplasty.
codes.documentation_tips: Document additional occluded vessel treated.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; stent, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Stent for stenotic lesion.
codes.documentation_tips: Document stenosis, stent type/size.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; stent, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for additional stenotic stent.
codes.documentation_tips: Document additional vessel stented.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; stent, complex occlusion, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Stent for CTO. High wRVU reflects complexity.
codes.documentation_tips: Document CTO crossing, stent details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; stent, complex occlusion, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for additional CTO stent.
codes.documentation_tips: Document additional CTO stented.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; atherectomy, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Atherectomy for stenosis.
codes.documentation_tips: Document atherectomy device, lesion characteristics.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; atherectomy, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for additional atherectomy.
codes.documentation_tips: Document additional vessel.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; atherectomy, complex occlusion, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Atherectomy for CTO.
codes.documentation_tips: Document CTO, atherectomy technique.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; atherectomy, complex occlusion, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for additional CTO atherectomy.
codes.documentation_tips: Document additional CTO treated.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; stent + atherectomy, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Combined stent and atherectomy for stenosis.
codes.documentation_tips: Document both interventions.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; stent + atherectomy, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for additional stent+ath.
codes.documentation_tips: Document additional vessel.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; stent + atherectomy, complex occlusion, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Combined stent+ath for CTO. Highest fem/pop wRVU.
codes.documentation_tips: Document CTO, both interventions.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, femoral/popliteal territory; stent + atherectomy, complex occlusion, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for additional CTO stent+ath.
codes.documentation_tips: Document additional CTO treated.

codes.full_name: Intravascular lithotripsy (IVL), femoral/popliteal territory, add-on
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for IVL (Shockwave) in fem/pop territory.
codes.documentation_tips: Document IVL device, cycles delivered, lesion treated.
codes.bundling_notes: Add-on to primary LER code. Use once per territory.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; angioplasty, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Tibial angioplasty for stenosis. Each tibial = separate vessel.
codes.documentation_tips: Document specific vessel (AT, PT, peroneal) and stenosis.
codes.bundling_notes: Each tibial vessel is separate for coding (unlike fem/pop).

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; angioplasty, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for additional tibial stenosis angioplasty.
codes.documentation_tips: Document each additional vessel.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; angioplasty, complex occlusion, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Tibial angioplasty for CTO.
codes.documentation_tips: Document total occlusion, crossing technique.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; angioplasty, complex occlusion, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Add-on for additional tibial CTO angioplasty.
codes.documentation_tips: Document additional CTO treated.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; stent, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Tibial territory stent, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vessel, lesion type, and intervention details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; stent, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Tibial territory stent, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vessel, lesion type, and intervention details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; stent, complex occlusion, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Tibial territory stent, complex occlusion, initial vessel.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vessel, lesion type, and intervention details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; stent, complex occlusion, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Tibial territory stent, complex occlusion, each additional vessel.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vessel, lesion type, and intervention details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; atherectomy, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Tibial territory atherectomy, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vessel, lesion type, and intervention details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; atherectomy, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Tibial territory atherectomy, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vessel, lesion type, and intervention details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; atherectomy, complex occlusion, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Tibial territory atherectomy, complex occlusion, initial vessel.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vessel, lesion type, and intervention details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; atherectomy, complex occlusion, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Tibial territory atherectomy, complex occlusion, each additional vessel.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vessel, lesion type, and intervention details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; stent + atherectomy, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Tibial territory stent + atherectomy, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vessel, lesion type, and intervention details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; stent + atherectomy, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Tibial territory stent + atherectomy, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vessel, lesion type, and intervention details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; stent + atherectomy, complex occlusion, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Tibial territory stent + atherectomy, complex occlusion, initial vessel.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vessel, lesion type, and intervention details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, tibial/peroneal territory; stent + atherectomy, complex occlusion, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Tibial territory stent + atherectomy, complex occlusion, each additional vessel.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vessel, lesion type, and intervention details.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, inframalleolar/pedal territory; angioplasty, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Inframalleolar (pedal) territory angioplasty, straightforward stenosis, initial vessel. New territory for 2026.
codes.documentation_tips: Document pedal vessel (dorsalis pedis, plantar) and lesion type.
codes.bundling_notes: NEW territory for 2026. Previously bundled or unlisted.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, inframalleolar/pedal territory; angioplasty, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Inframalleolar (pedal) territory angioplasty, straightforward stenosis, each additional vessel. New territory for 2026.
codes.documentation_tips: Document pedal vessel (dorsalis pedis, plantar) and lesion type.
codes.bundling_notes: NEW territory for 2026. Previously bundled or unlisted.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, inframalleolar/pedal territory; angioplasty, complex occlusion, initial vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Inframalleolar (pedal) territory angioplasty, complex occlusion, initial vessel. New territory for 2026.
codes.documentation_tips: Document pedal vessel (dorsalis pedis, plantar) and lesion type.
codes.bundling_notes: NEW territory for 2026. Previously bundled or unlisted.

codes.full_name: Revascularization, inframalleolar/pedal territory; angioplasty, complex occlusion, each additional vessel
codes.details: NEW 2026. Inframalleolar (pedal) territory angioplasty, complex occlusion, each additional vessel. New territory for 2026.
codes.documentation_tips: Document pedal vessel (dorsalis pedis, plantar) and lesion type.
codes.bundling_notes: NEW territory for 2026. Previously bundled or unlisted.

codes.full_name: Thrombectomy, direct; femoropopliteal, aortoiliac artery, by leg incision
codes.details: Open arterial thrombectomy/embolectomy.
codes.documentation_tips: Document inflow/outflow, completion angio/Doppler.

codes.full_name: Direct repair of aneurysm, abdominal aorta; tube prosthesis
codes.details: Open AAA repair with tube graft.
codes.documentation_tips: Document clamp sites, graft type, anastomosis technique.

codes.full_name: Direct repair of aneurysm, abdominal aorta; ruptured
codes.details: Emergent open repair for ruptured AAA.
codes.documentation_tips: Document rupture, blood loss, resuscitation.

codes.full_name: Direct repair of aneurysm, thoracoabdominal (requires separate visceral reimplantation)
codes.details: Open thoracoabdominal aneurysm repair.
codes.documentation_tips: Document extent (Crawford classification), visceral management.
codes.bundling_notes: Major complexity. Consider critical care billing.

codes.full_name: Thromboendarterectomy, carotid; by neck incision
codes.details: Standard carotid endarterectomy. Patch angioplasty included.
codes.documentation_tips: Document shunt use, patch type, neuromonitoring.
codes.bundling_notes: Patch closure included. Cannot bill 35390 additionally.

codes.full_name: Reoperation, carotid, thromboendarterectomy, more than one month after original operation
codes.details: Redo CEA more than 30 days after initial.
codes.documentation_tips: Document prior surgery date, indication for redo.

codes.full_name: Bypass graft, with other than vein; common carotid-ipsilateral internal carotid
codes.details: Prosthetic bypass from CCA to ICA.
codes.documentation_tips: Document graft type, anastomosis technique.

codes.full_name: Bypass graft, with other than vein; carotid-subclavian
codes.details: Bypass from carotid to subclavian for subclavian stenosis/occlusion.
codes.documentation_tips: Document indication (steal, arm ischemia), graft type.

codes.full_name: Bypass graft, with vein; axillary-femoral
codes.details: Extra-anatomic bypass for aortoiliac disease.
codes.documentation_tips: Document indication, graft tunneling route.

codes.full_name: Bypass graft, with other than vein; aortobifemoral
codes.details: Standard aortobifemoral bypass for aortoiliac occlusive disease.
codes.documentation_tips: Document graft configuration, clamp sites, outflow.
codes.bundling_notes: Includes both femoral anastomoses. Do not bill bilateral.

codes.full_name: Bypass graft, with other than vein; femoral-popliteal
codes.details: Prosthetic fem-pop bypass (above or below knee).
codes.documentation_tips: Document popliteal level (AK vs BK), graft type.

codes.full_name: Bypass graft, with other than vein; femoral-femoral
codes.details: Cross-femoral bypass for unilateral iliac disease.
codes.documentation_tips: Document donor and recipient sides, graft tunneling.
codes.bundling_notes: Do not confuse with fem-pop (35656). Inherently bilateral.

codes.full_name: Secondary percutaneous transluminal thrombectomy
codes.details: Mechanical thrombectomy performed for embolization during another procedure.
codes.documentation_tips: Document indication (embolization event), vessels treated.
codes.bundling_notes: Add-on to primary procedure. For unexpected emboli.

codes.full_name: Transcatheter therapy, infusion for thrombolysis, arterial
codes.details: Catheter-directed lytic infusion for arterial thrombosis.
codes.documentation_tips: Document access, catheter position, lytic agent, duration.
codes.bundling_notes: Initial day of therapy. Use 37212-37214 for subsequent days.

codes.full_name: Unlisted procedure, vascular surgery
codes.details: Use for procedures without specific CPT code. Requires manual pricing.
codes.documentation_tips: Submit detailed operative note. Reference comparable CPT code.
codes.bundling_notes: Manual review by payer. Set expectation with patient.

codes.full_name: Injection of sclerosing solution; multiple veins, same leg
codes.details: Multiple vein sclerotherapy same leg.
codes.documentation_tips: Document all veins treated, total sclerosant.
codes.bundling_notes: 10-day global. Use once per leg regardless of vein count.

codes.full_name: Injection of sclerosing solution; single incompetent vein
codes.details: Single vein sclerotherapy.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vein, sclerosant type/volume.

codes.full_name: Endovenous mechanochemical ablation, first vein
codes.details: Mechanochemical ablation (e.g., ClariVein).
codes.documentation_tips: Document device, sclerosant, vein treated.

codes.full_name: Endovenous mechanochemical ablation, additional vein
codes.details: Add-on for additional MOCA vein same limb.
codes.documentation_tips: Document additional vein.

codes.full_name: Endovenous ablation therapy, first vein treated; radiofrequency
codes.details: Radiofrequency ablation of GSV or SSV.
codes.documentation_tips: Document vein treated, length ablated, access site.
codes.bundling_notes: 10-day global. Use 36476 for additional same-limb veins.

codes.full_name: Endovenous ablation therapy, additional vein; radiofrequency
codes.details: Add-on for additional vein RFA same limb.
codes.documentation_tips: Document additional vein(s) treated.

codes.full_name: Endovenous ablation therapy, first vein treated; laser
codes.details: Laser ablation of GSV or SSV.
codes.documentation_tips: Document laser settings, vein treated, length.

codes.full_name: Endovenous ablation therapy, additional vein; laser
codes.details: Add-on for additional vein laser ablation same limb.
codes.documentation_tips: Document additional vein(s).

codes.full_name: Insertion of intravascular vena cava filter, endovascular approach
codes.details: IVC filter insertion for PE prophylaxis.
codes.documentation_tips: Document indication, filter type, positioning.

codes.full_name: Repositioning of intravascular vena cava filter, endovascular approach
codes.details: Repositioning of tilted or migrated filter.
codes.documentation_tips: Document indication, technique, final position.

codes.full_name: Retrieval of intravascular vena cava filter, endovascular approach
codes.details: IVC filter removal. May require advanced techniques.
codes.documentation_tips: Document filter type, dwell time, retrieval technique.
codes.bundling_notes: May need unlisted code if complex retrieval.

codes.full_name: Transcatheter placement of intravascular stent, iliac vein, initial vessel
codes.details: Iliofemoral vein stent for May-Thurner, post-thrombotic, etc.
codes.documentation_tips: Document indication (compression, post-thrombotic), stent details.

codes.full_name: Transcatheter placement of intravascular stent, iliac vein, each additional vessel
codes.details: Add-on for additional iliac vein stent.
codes.documentation_tips: Document additional vessel stented.

codes.full_name: Stab phlebectomy of varicose veins, 10-20 stab incisions
codes.details: Ambulatory phlebectomy, 10-20 incisions.
codes.documentation_tips: Document number of incisions, veins removed.

codes.full_name: Stab phlebectomy of varicose veins, more than 20 stab incisions
codes.details: Ambulatory phlebectomy, >20 incisions.
codes.documentation_tips: Document total incision count.
